phase1_crud.notes: Created all CRUD endpoints with Object Store persistence

phase2_validation.notes: Implemented comprehensive field validation with proper error messages

phase3_error_handling.notes: Implemented consistent error response format with appropriate HTTP status codes

phase4_observability.notes: Added structured logging with sensitive data masking and health endpoint

phase6_deployment.notes: Prepared for CloudHub 2.0 deployment with externalized configuration

phase7_governance.notes: Documented Exchange publication and API Manager rate limiting policy application

phase8_agent_invocation.notes: Documented MCP server integration for AI agent discovery and invocation
